title: Whatever happened to that former wall street banker guy who quit his job to play League of Legends?
body: I remember him having a wife and a kid and Riot doing this whole video about it. This was season 3-4 when the video came out and I just thought to myself "that poor woman" who said in the video that she supported his decision but the tone in her voice was total confusion. Did that guy ever make anything out of playing a video game or did he have to go back into reality and get a real job again?
